humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, sentinel lymph nodes 1, 2, and 3 were biopsied and none of them were found to have metastatic carcinoma (0/1 for each lymph node). Based on the new rule 11, N0 can indicate that all assessed lymph nodes are negative for metastatic carcinoma. Therefore, the N stage for this patient's cancer is N0.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that three sentinel lymph nodes were examined and none of them had metastatic carcinoma (0/1 for each node). Therefore, the pathologic N stage for this patient is N0.
